page.title: 12HAIRDRESSING IN SYMINGTON
page.content: There has been a hairdresser called {MYRA}in Symington for about 6 months. They called the shop{MYRA'S }after the owner's name.{MYRA}gets about 17_20 customers in a day.The electrical equipment used are hairdryers, curling tongs, musical stereo and a hotbrush.Their job is very tiring because they have got to stand on their feet all day and they get a sore back and sore legs. A Saturday is their busiest day.The latest style is very short hair.A haircut is Â£2.50,a perm is Â£14_Â£16.Blonde streaks cost from Â£9.00.Cut and blow dry is Â£5.70. Shampoo and set is Â£3.00.Pensioners get reduced rates.The shop opens at 9:00a.m.and closes at 5:00p.m.{MYRA} did about 10 perms this week. Punks come in and get their hair done and the hairdressers don't mind.
